Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 61 Village Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Jul 21, 2025, 12:46 IST
 National Disaster Management Authority
 61 Jobs |  Posted On : 21-Jul-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 11,100 to 35,100




FOLLOW

The Coimbatore Revenue and Disaster Management Department (Coimbatore RDM) has officially released the notification to fill up the 61 Village Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for the Jobs in Tamil Nadu.

Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Village Assistant	61	10th pass

Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 32 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For BC/SC/ST candidates: 05 Years.
For PWD candidates: 10 Years.

Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is

Written Test.
Interview.

Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 11,100/- per month.
The maximum salary: RS. 35,100/- per month.
How to Apply for the Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025:
Go to the Official website.
Visit the  Coimbatore RDM Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Concerned Taluka Office, Coimbatore District.

Important Dates:

Starting date	17-07-2025
Closing date	18-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Application Form	Click Here
